person.persName: Fortunatus Shirley (Bath County, Kentucky, tailor and farmer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, tailor and farmer. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth S. Brother Shirley in Bath County, Kentucky, in December 1851. Father of Ann E. Shirley, Elvina Shirley, and James B. Shirley. Tailor in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned ten enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Farmer in Bath County in 1863.
